mapper.select: select /* selectVocDbTest */ * from cust_family where rownum < 10

{ CALL PKG_WEB.SP_SET_ACPT( #{rsltcode, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rsltmsg, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type}, #{cust_nm}, #{reg_num}, #{ipin}, #{web_id}, #{zipcode}, #{zipcode_sq}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{email}, #{hdph}, #{hsph}, #{child_nm1}, #{child_brt1}, #{child_sx1}, #{child_nm2}, #{child_brt2}, #{child_sx2}, #{prod_id1}, #{prod_id2}, #{prod_gb}, #{vcher_yn}, #{acpt_dt}, #{choice_item1}, #{choice_item2}, #{suppl_addr} ) }
